content.raw: P4 suggested adding an event log to the console, that prints out all significant events. This would be particularly helpful if there are multiple people adding tasks, so that it's clear what the queue looks like. Errors would pop up here as well as notification if something is launching/coming down, etc.  "Anything that affects (him)"
